content: It seems like the wlog tactic in the mathlib doc has an incomplete description. It says: Given a goal of the form g xs, a predicate p over a set of variables, as well as variable permutations xs_i. Then wlog produces goals of the form, but then doesn't describe the goal.
Ok, I'll do the PR, except I'm not sure what to add. Here is the link to the docs btw: https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib_docs/tactics.html#wlog
you can also write tactic#wlog and zulip will generate the link for you
